articles.description: A fully clothed Tyson Fury weighs in four stone heavier than champion Oleksandr Usyk for Saturday's heavyweight world title fight in Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Fully clothed Fury four stone heavier than Usyk

articles.description: Manchester City suffer a fresh injury blow as defender Ruben Dias is ruled out for "three or four weeks" with a muscle injury.
articles.title: Ruben Dias: Manchester City defender ruled out for 'three or four weeks'

articles.description: BBC Sport asks the world of boxing for their predictions for Tyson Fury's rematch against Oleksandr Usyk on Saturday.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Predictions for heavyweight world title fight from Eddie Hearn, Natasha Jonas & more

articles.description: George Eastham, a member of England's 1966 World Cup-winning squad, dies aged 88.
articles.title: England 1966 World Cup squad member George Eastham dies at 88

articles.description: Michael van Gerwen and Stephen Bunting both move into the third round of the 2025 PDC World Darts Championship with victories at Alexandra Palace on Friday.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Wins for Michael van Gerwen & Stephen Bunting

articles.description: Munster hand Ulster a fifth consecutive loss in all competitions with a 22-19 bonus-point victory at Kingspan Stadium.
articles.title: United Rugby Championship - Ulster 19-22 Munster: Farrell hat-trick sees Munster stun 14-man Ulster

articles.description: Lennox Lewis backs Tyson Fury to get revenge over Oleksandr Usyk in their heavyweight unification fight on Saturday.
articles.title: Fury vs Usyk 2: Lennox Lewis makes prediction for heavyweight unification fight

articles.description: Dele to sign for Como, Chelsea interested in goalkeeper Gregor Kobel, Marcus Rashford could leave Manchester United on loan, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Dele, Rashford, Kobel, Guimaraes, Zubimendi, Van Dijk, Davies, Calvert-Lewin, Pereira

articles.description: The Spurs boss says he has faced 'offensive' criticism and wants more respect shown towards him and his managerial colleagues in the Premier League.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham boss thinks managers deserve 'more respect'

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Reverend & the Makers singer Jon McClure.
